title: Ep 356 | Miss Kay Sends 'Text Messages' to Phil & Jase Makes a Pickup Line Creepy with One Word
description:
Phil doesn't realize Miss Kay has been texting him. Jase and Al point out the similarities — and distinct differences — between Jesus and Superman. Jase shares a creepy pickup line that no one should ever use. Al recalls two guys who caved in an entire wall while wrestling in his mobile home. And Jase explains some of the curious death customs described in the Bible.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
